<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bone Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=2845) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 204 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Using your ancestors' bones, you manifest their spirits around you in a fossilized form, terrifying your foes. You can cast [_mask of terror_](/Spells.aspx?ID=185) on yourself as a primal innate spell once per day. When you do, you appear as a skeletal lizardfolk ancestor, twisted in a way that inspires the deepest fears of those who observe you.
name: Bone Rider
